scripts.build: tsc --build && chmod +x dist/src/cli/index.js && npm run build:demo:favicon && npm run build:demo -- --minify --one-file && npm run build:tv:favicon && npm run build:tv -- --minify --one-file
scripts.build:demo:favicon: for s in 1 2 3 4 12; do f=dist/public/demo/favicon/favicon$(($s * 16)); aseprite src/demo/assets/favicon.aseprite --batch --color-mode=indexed --scale=$s --save-as=$f.png && cwebp -exact -lossless -mt -quiet -z 9 $f.png -o $f.webp; done
scripts.build:tv:favicon: for s in 1 2 3 4 12; do f=dist/public/tv/favicon/favicon$(($s * 16)); aseprite src/tv/assets/favicon.aseprite --batch --color-mode=indexed --scale=$s --save-as=$f.png && cwebp -exact -lossless -mt -quiet -z 9 $f.png -o $f.webp; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: ! git symbolic-ref --quiet HEAD || git push --follow-tags origin "$(git branch --show-current)"
scripts.start: tsc --build --preserveWatchOutput --watch& npm run build:demo:favicon && npm run build:demo -- --watch& npm run build:tv:favicon && npm run build:tv -- --watch=5678& wait
scripts.test: lint && npm run test:unit && npm run build
scripts.version: npm pkg set published=$(date +%Y%m%d) && npm run clean && npm test
